sentence.Network_cn: 在一场纠纷中进行仲裁

sentence.Network_en: He was asked to arbitrate between management and the unions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被邀请在资方与工会之间做出仲裁.
得有一个人在他们当中进行仲裁.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 文都考研词汇词根（1-1000） - 豆丁网 ... arbiter 仲裁者, 判优器 arbitrate 作出公断 arc 弧, 弓形, 拱.

arbitrary, totally 完全任意的arbitrate 任意的arbitration 判优

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin arbitrat- 'judged', from arbitrari, from arbiter 'judge, supreme ruler'

entry.def: When someone in authority arbitrates between two people or groups who are in dispute, they consider all the facts and make an official decision about who is right.

example.ex: He arbitrates between investors and members of the association...
example.tran: 他在投资者和该协会成员之间作出仲裁。

example.ex: The tribunal had been set up to arbitrate in the dispute.
example.tran: 曾设立过特别法庭对此纷争作出仲裁。

means.word_mean: 1. act between parties with a view to reconciling differences;

auth_sentence.content: He was called upon to arbitrate disputes as though he were an unofficial judge.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was called upon to arbitrate disputes as though he were an unofficial judge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was called upon to arbitrate disputes as though he were an unofficial judge.

auth_sentence.content: The English king, Edward I, was asked to arbitrate and chose John Balliol to be king.
auth_sentence.res_content: The English king, Edward I, was asked to arbitrate and chose John Balliol to be king.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The English king, Edward I, was asked to arbitrate and chose John Balliol to be king.

auth_sentence.content: This is right because we're not out to arbitrate whether those charged with hypocrisy are actually hypocrites.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is right because we're not out to arbitrate whether those charged with hypocrisy are actually hypocrites.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is right because we're not out to arbitrate whether those charged with hypocrisy are actually hypocrites.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 任意的,任性的,主观的;专断的,武断的
stems_affixes.word_buile: arbitr判断+ary……的→做出[自己的]判断→武断的

sentences.en: The judge arbitrated a disagreement between workers and management.
sentences.cn: 仲裁人对工人和管理层之间的纠纷进行了仲裁。

sentences.en: He was asked to arbitrate between management and the unions.
sentences.cn: 他被邀请在资方与工会之间做出仲裁。
